name: Hall Infinite
description:
Inspired by classic platformers across multiple generations of consoles, Hall Infinite is an infinite runner spanning across several varied environments.

It is a very challenging infinite runner that will require precise timing and deliberate movements in order to achieve a high score.

KEY FEATURES:

Multiple Environments
Tired of endlessly running in the same 3 places over and over? Hall Infinite has what you're looking for - progress through vastly different areas as you embark on a journey with the goal of achieving the highest score in the world!

Multiple Playable Characters
Unlock different characters as you progress through the game. Each character has a unique skillset in order to conquer their specific locations.

Online Leaderboards
Do you get exhausted just running endlessly and collecting coins with no goals in sight? Well, look no further than our online leaderboard system! Compete against your friends and enemies alike across the entire globe, and vie for the top spot and the ultimate bragging rights.

Graphics and Sound
Here you'll find clean and uncluttered low poly style graphics to give your eyes a rest from the usual clutter of those pesky high definition games clogging up the charts. Your ears will be treated with a vast heart pumping soundtrack that keeps your heart rate up in every level.
